title: Hydrogeochemical characteristics and air quality risks associated with gold mining operations in Egypt using geochemical modeling and risk indices
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Ahmed Ali El-Sayed M. Ata, Mobarak H. Aly, Hend Hussein, Mohamed Hamdy Eid, Mostafa R. Abukhadra, Ahmed M. El-Sherbeeny, Stefano Bellucci, Mohamed Gad
